channel.title: Please help someone
channel.description:
okay!! i dont understand this... i cant get my runserver.bat to work... when i click on runserver it just sayz:
'java' is not recognized as an internal or external command, operable program or batch file. Press any key to continue . . .
this is wat i edited my runserver.bat file to:
@echo off title Runserver set java="C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_10\bin\java.exe" java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server pause
i no for a fact i have jdk1.5.0_10... so can someone please tell me if this is wrong or wat i need to put it to...

item.title: Please help someone
item.dc:creator: @i7ont_i3link i7ont i3link
item.description:
@i7ont_i3link wrote:

okay the old gsta didnt help… he wanted me to send my files to him… well im not gonna do that ppl… if u can walkme through this and help me get my server up and goin ill deff rep u and i will still pay u on runescape if u play… just i/m me… my screen name is aga519… just trust me on tha payment… just i/m me and ill work sumthin out… please ppl!!! i CANT figure this out… ive been through every tut i can find,and i cant figure it out… [br][size=1]Posted at: December 16, 2006, 12:27:01 AM[/size][hr]i understand most of it all i just need help figurin out wat goes in my runserver.bat file and idk but i think my complie.bat file is okay… but if u can help me get it up ill do wateva i can to help u… [br][size=1]Posted at: December 16, 2006, 12:29:10 AM[/size][hr]this is worth 100k and up on rs and also ill ull be an admin on my server if i can get it back up… =O

Read full topic

item.title: Please help someone

item.description:
@i7ont_i3link wrote:

wat number do i cahnge to a 6 or 7 or 8 etc…???[br][size=1]Posted at: December 15, 2006, 10:42:29 PM[/size][hr]grr!!! does anyone else have an idea on wats wrong??? my runserver files sayz:

@echo off
title blinkscape
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server

now… and when i try to run it all it does is pop up for a sec then closes itself before i can read or see anything on it… anyhelp out there??? ill rep++ if y acan help and i can try to repay u in anyway i can cuz ive been workin on this for like 3 dayz now and i still cant find out tha problem(s)…[br][size=1]Posted at: December 15, 2006, 11:03:38 PM[/size][hr]my aim name is aga519… if anyone wants to i/m me and help me get my server up i am willin to pay on runesacpe if u play… someone please help lol im goin crazy over this!!!

item.title: Please help someone
item.dc:creator: @i7ont_i3link i7ont i3link
item.description:
@i7ont_i3link wrote:

okay my compile.bat works but i put

@echo off
title “Server-Name” Server
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server

that in my runserver.bat and all it does is i click on it and it opens up and it just closes right away… sooo wat else do u think it could be?

Read full topic

item.title: Please help someone
item.dc:creator: @Mladen Mladen
item.description:
@Mladen wrote:

Compile
@echo off
title “Server-Name” Compiler
“C:Program FilesJavajdk1.5.0_09injavac” *.java
title Compile successful
@echo Compile successful!
@echo ----------------------------------------------------
pause

Runserver.bat
@echo off
title “Server-Name” Server
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
[br][size=1]Posted at: December 15, 2006, 10:34:00 PM[/size][hr]Dont ask for rep…

Read full topic
